item.title: Saving into moreinfo file
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

how do I make it so I can save information into a moreinfo file not make one but add information to it like a new line. What I have so far is this…

public int inKKK = 0;

then this under case 1

else if (token.equals("character-inKKK")) { inKKK = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

then this under savemoreinfo()

characterfile.write("character-inKKK = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(inKKK), 0, Integer.toString(inKKK).length()); characterfile.newLine();

is there something I’m missing because it doesn’t give errors but whenever it tries to save it freezes server.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 09:15:13 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
